Articles.Content: This is a pretty simple concept - better recovery of stages and boosters. AKA, we should be able to turn of despawning of low-altitude debris, or make debris with probe cores stay spawned. When you invest hundreds of thousands of Kerbollars into your heavy-lift first stage, you sort of want some of your cash back. My solution now is to have my core stage boost into orbit and recover it using RCS and a Remote Guidance Unit, but I'll still lose my boosters.

This is discussed in quite a lot of topics - you might want to have a look here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88772-Control-distance-extended-or-tweakable

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86248-0-24-If-a-Booster-Has-Enough-Parachutes-On-It-Count-it-as-Recovered
Indeed, better keep this topic going with the previous threads. Closed.
